metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38165 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Lynx through 2.8.9 mishandles the userinfo subcomponent of a URI, whichallows remote attackers to discover cleartext credentials because they mayappear in SNI data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lynx - 2.8.9dev8-4ubuntu1+esm2
lynx-common - 2.8.9dev8-4ubuntu1+esm2
lynx-cur - 2.8.9dev8-4ubuntu1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lynx package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.9dev8-4ubuntu1+esm2').
